This is the course website for "[EMSE](https://www.emse.seas.gwu.edu/) 4571: Intro to Programming for Analytics" at the [George Washington University](https://www.gwu.edu/). This is the first part of a two-course sequence designed to provide a foundation in programming for data analytics using the [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/):

- Course 1: [EMSE 4571: Intro to Programming for Analytics](http://p4a.seas.gwu.edu/)
- Course 2: [EMSE 4572: Exploratory Data Analysis](http://eda.seas.gwu.edu/)
